name: Stopocop
description:
The old chief of police decided to take on the matter personally. An unknown maniac hunts old women, but a gallant cop must do everything possible so that the enemy bullet only hits the bad and does not hurt the good citizens.

STOPOCOP - Top Down game where the player runs around the level and blocks with a shield, must reflect enemy bullets and direct them in the direction where the enemies are in order to destroy them, but without touching civilians.

Features of the game:
- Beautiful graphics
- Dynamic music
- Complexity
